headline: Seattle-area Mazda drivers report radios are stuck on the local NPR station
author: Ben Hooper
sentences: KUOW-FM, the Seattle-area NPR station, confirmed it had been contacted by multiple Mazda drivers in the area who reported the HD Radio in the Mazda infotainment center of their vehicles was stuck on the station.
The drivers said the radio is frozen on the station and the visuals on the dashboard screen are constantly rebooting, causing a visual hazard for some.
Seattle-area drivers of Mazda vehicles from 2014-17 have reported an unusual problem -- their radios are stuck on the local NPR station.

All of the affected vehicles appear
Comments:
You gotta get people to listen to NPR one way or another.
Many drivers have taken to social media to complain about the issue.
